name: CLM_VALUES
description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES table holds claim-level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_TYP_QUAL
columns.description: The value indicating whether the billing provider on the claim is a person or a non-person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The billing provider's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).

columns.name: BIL_PROV_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The billing provider's first name. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_NAM_MID
columns.description: The billing provider's middle name. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the billing provider's name (e.g., Jr, III). It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_NPI
columns.description: The billing provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: BIL_PROV_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The billing provider's taxonomy code.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_TAXID_QUAL
columns.description: The qualifier for the billing provider's tax ID defining the type of ID reported as the tax ID.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_TAXID
columns.description: The billing provider's tax ID. For individuals, this ID could be the SSN or tax ID.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_UPIN
columns.description: The billing provider's unique physician identification number (UPIN). It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_LIC_NUM
columns.description: The billing provider's license number. It is only populated when the billing provider is a person.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the billing provider's street address.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the billing provider's street address.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_CITY
columns.description: The billing provider's city.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_STATE
columns.description: The billing provider's state.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_ZIP
columns.description: The billing provider's ZIP Code.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_CNTRY
columns.description: The billing provider's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: BIL_PROV_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The billing provider's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_SEQ_CD
columns.description: The code identifying the filing order for the claim (e.g., primary, secondary, tertiary).

columns.name: CLM_CVG_PYR_NAM
columns.description: The payer name.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_GRP_NUM
columns.description: The group number entered in the coverage record.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_GRP_NAM
columns.description: The group name entered in the coverage record.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_INS_TYP
columns.description: The insurance type code for the claim.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_FILING_IND
columns.description: The indicator identifying the type of claim.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_PYR_ID_TYP
columns.description: The qualifier that describes the type of ID used to identify the payer.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_PYR_ID
columns.description: The primary ID for the payer.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_ACPT_ASGN
columns.description: The indicator that the provider accepts assignment from the payer.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_AUTH_PMT
columns.description: The indicator that the insured assigns benefits to the provider.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_REL_INFO
columns.description: The indicator that the insured has authorized the release of information to the payer.

columns.name: PYR_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the payer's street address.

columns.name: PYR_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the payer's street address.

columns.name: PYR_CITY
columns.description: The payer's city.

columns.name: PYR_STATE
columns.description: The payer's state.

columns.name: PYR_ZIP
columns.description: The payer's ZIP Code.

columns.name: PYR_CNTRY
columns.description: The payer's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: PYR_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The payer's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: PAT_NAM_LAST
columns.description: The patient's last name.

columns.name: PAT_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: The patient's first name.

columns.name: PAT_NAM_MID
columns.description: The patient's middle name.

columns.name: PAT_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the patient's name (e.g., Jr, III).

columns.name: PAT_MRN
columns.description: The patient's medical record number.

columns.name: PAT_CVG_MEM_ID
columns.description: The coverage member ID for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_REL_TO_INS
columns.description: The patient's relationship to the coverage subscriber.

columns.name: PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The patient's birthdate.

columns.name: PAT_SEX
columns.description: The patient's gender.

columns.name: PAT_SIG_ON_FILE
columns.description: The indicator that the patient has signed the necessary release forms and the forms are on file at the provider.

columns.name: PAT_SIG_SRC
columns.description: The indicator that the release forms were signed on the patient's behalf.

columns.name: PAT_DEATH_DATE
columns.description: The date of the patient's death.

columns.name: PAT_WT
columns.description: The patient's weight (in pounds) when needed for the claim.

columns.name: PAT_PREG_IND
columns.description: The indicator that the patient is pregnant.

columns.name: PAT_WK_COMP_NUM
columns.description: The identification number used for workers' comp claims.

columns.name: PAT_MAR_STAT
columns.description: The patient's marital status.

columns.name: PAT_EMPY_STAT
columns.description: The patient's employment status.

columns.name: PAT_PH
columns.description: The patient's phone number.

columns.name: PAT_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the patient's street address.

columns.name: PAT_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the patient's street address.

columns.name: PAT_CITY
columns.description: The patient's city.

columns.name: PAT_STATE
columns.description: The patient's state.

columns.name: PAT_ZIP
columns.description: The patient's ZIP Code.

columns.name: PAT_CNTRY
columns.description: The patient's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: PAT_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The patient's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: INV_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number that uniquely identifies the claim in the billing system.

columns.name: ICN
columns.description: The payer's internal control number (ICN) that uniquely identifies the claim in the payer's system.

columns.name: TTL_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total charge amount for the claim.

columns.name: BILL_TYP_FAC_CD
columns.description: The facility code portion of the bill type (first and second digits).

columns.name: BILL_TYP_FREQ_CD
columns.description: The frequency code portion of the bill type (third digit).

columns.name: MOMS_MRN
columns.description: The mother's medical record number when the patient is a newborn.

columns.name: PAYTO_ADDR_TYP_QUAL
columns.description: The indicator that the pay-to address entity on the claim is a person or a non-person.
